description: This template allows you to create multiple RHEL 8.0 VMs running JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster and also deploy a web application called eap-session-replication, you can login into the admin console using the JBoss EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys an eap-session-replication web application on JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster running on multiple RHEL 8.0 VMs.
